product.name: Dayring
product.slogan: Visualize a guilt-free and grounded day

requirements.description: Fix incorrect soft task gradient origin (duplicate gradient starting at task midpoint)
steps: Enable a task with soft fade enabled
Render the task annulus segment
Verify only one gradient exists per task
Verify the gradient starts exactly at the task start time and not at the midpoint

requirements.description: Replace discrete strip-based gradients with smooth analog gradients for tasks, with fades extending beyond task duration
steps: Enable soft fade for a task
Render the task annulus segment with fade enabled
Verify the fade-in gradient extends before the task start time until fully transparent
Verify the fade-out gradient extends after the task end time until fully transparent
Confirm the task start and end times are fully transparent (100% alpha = 0)
Inspect the gradient at high zoom
Verify the gradient transitions continuously without visible color banding or discrete strips

requirements.description: Improve wake and sleep time fade gradients to eliminate visible annulus traces
steps: Enable soft fade for wake and sleep times
Observe the fade-out region near full transparency
Verify no visible annulus edge or color residue remains at the end of the fade
Confirm full transparency at fade endpoints

requirements.description: Fix passed-time gradient blending with unallocated time
steps: Advance current time into passed-time region
Observe gradient boundary between passed time and unallocated time
Verify colors do not blend or muddy at the transition
Confirm a clean, visually intentional transition between regions

requirements.description: Prevent current time text from overlapping the current time radial line
steps: Rotate current time radial line through full 360 degrees
Track current time text position relative to the radial line
Verify text never overlaps the radial line at any angle
Confirm a minimum visual padding is maintained

requirements.description: Dynamically place current time text to avoid overlapping other UI elements
steps: Render current time text near the radial line
Detect nearby UI elements (remaining time text, task labels)
Automatically select the closest available non-overlapping position
Verify text remains legible and does not collide with any other text

requirements.description: Increase current time text size for better legibility
steps: Render current time text using updated font size
Compare visual prominence against 'X hrs remaining' text
Verify current time text is clearly readable without dominating the UI

requirements.description: Replace native Windows scrollbar in configure window with app-integrated scrollbar
steps: Open configure window on Windows
Inspect scrollbar appearance and behavior
Verify scrollbar matches app visual style
Confirm native OS scrollbar is not visible

requirements.description: Ensure annulus rendering is not clipped at window edges
steps: Resize application window to minimum supported dimensions
Observe annulus edges on all sides
Verify no part of the annulus is clipped or cut off

requirements.description: Prevent warning messages in configure window from being clipped
steps: Create overlapping tasks or out-of-bounds task times
Trigger warning messages in the configure window
Verify all warning text is fully visible
Confirm no clipping occurs at window boundaries

requirements.description: Remove inner and outer borders of the annulus
steps: Render the annulus in normal operation
Inspect the inner and outer edges of the annulus
Verify no visible border, stroke, or outline exists on either edge
Confirm the annulus blends cleanly into the background

requirements.description: Increase shadow strength of current time text for better contrast against annulus
steps: Render current time text over bright and dark annulus regions
Increase text shadow opacity, blur, or offset
Verify the text remains readable at all annulus positions
Confirm the shadow improves separation without appearing harsh or distracting

requirements.description: Fix incorrect gradient direction for tasks near wake time and sleep time
steps: Create a task that starts near the wake time boundary
Enable soft fade for the task
Observe the gradient direction near the wake time
Verify the fade-in and fade-out directions are consistent with task orientation
Repeat the test for a task near the sleep time boundary
Confirm gradients face the correct direction in both cases (see gradient-bug.png)

requirements.description: Ensure tasks are rendered immediately on app launch without requiring soft toggle
steps: Launch the application from a cold start
Observe the task annulus rendering state on initial load
Verify all existing tasks are rendered immediately
Confirm no user interaction (such as clicking the soft toggle) is required to trigger rendering

requirements.description: Update Buy Me a Coffee window to use the app-integrated scrollbar
steps: Open the Buy Me a Coffee window
Inspect the scrollbar appearance and behavior
Compare scrollbar style with the one used in the configure window
Verify the native OS scrollbar is not visible
Confirm the scrollbar matches the app-integrated design

requirements.description: Enforce contrast hierarchy and template-scoped task colors for each color palette
steps: Iterate through each color template in the palette
Render passed time and unallocated time using the template colors
Verify maximum contrast exists between passed time and unallocated time
Render task colors against unallocated time
Verify sufficient contrast exists between unallocated time and task colors
Select a color template
Create a new task
Verify the task color is selected exclusively from the current template's task color set

requirements.description: Blend task gradients by transitioning from unallocated time color to task color
steps: See the screenshot blend.png
Observe the fade-in and fade-out regions of the task
Verify the gradient transitions from unallocated time color into the task color
Confirm the gradient does not simply fade alpha over the unallocated time color
Inspect both ends of the task to ensure smooth color blending

requirements.description: Improve overall visual appearance of the overlay based on current app_issues.png
steps: Compare the current overlay rendering to the reference screenshot app_issues.png
Identify visual artifacts such as banding, clipping, harsh edges, and poor contrast
Adjust rendering, spacing, and visual effects to reduce clutter and visual noise
Verify the overlay appears cleaner, more cohesive, and more polished than the reference
